CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1958, pg. 27 reads: "Partners Split - When the partnership of Montgomery Jones and H.P. Tardy Sr., who own a grocery store at Paulson and Shetland Ave., was strained by a series of quarrels, the partners agreed, following cross-suits at two aldermen's offices last week, to dissolve the partnership. Pictured above shows litigants before Alderman August A. Costa. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Three women, including one wearing dark button down coat, holding umbrella, and two men, gathered in front of Alderman August A. Costa, seated at desk, in office interior
